I believe this can significantly improve usability and communication in underserved areas.

I have hands-on experience with Python, Django, REST APIs, and Docker. I've previously built full-stack applications and worked in DevOps . Iâ€™m confident these skills align well with the technical requirements of the project.

I'd love to hear your thoughts on the best way to get started contributing and preparing for the proposal. Also, Iâ€™m happy to help with any existing issues or improvements if needed!

Looking forward to working with you all.
